title: New Vegan Menu Launched
content: Our restaurant now offers a full vegan menu featuring locally sourced ingredients.

title: Live Jazz Nights Every Friday
content: Enjoy smooth live jazz music every Friday night from 7PM to 10PM.

title: Mother's Day Special Set Menu
content: Celebrate Mother's Day with a special 3-course set menu for only $39.95.

title: Staff Spotlight: Meet Chef Anna
content: This week we’re spotlighting Chef Anna and her culinary journey.

title: Extended Opening Hours
content: We’re now open until 11PM on weekends to serve you better.

title: Customer Appreciation Week
content: Get a free dessert with every main course during Customer Appreciation Week.

title: Health and Safety Update
content: Read about our enhanced hygiene practices to keep you safe.

title: Booking System Upgraded
content: Our online booking system is now faster and easier to use.

title: Summer Drinks Are Here!
content: Cool off with our new line of handcrafted summer beverages.

title: New Parking Arrangements
content: We now have more parking spots available behind the building.

title: Chef's Table Experience
content: Reserve an exclusive seat at our Chef’s Table this weekend.

title: Now Hiring Front-of-House Staff
content: We’re expanding our team — apply now to join our front-of-house crew.

title: Food Waste Reduction Initiative
content: Learn about how we’re cutting food waste through composting and donations.

title: Kids Eat Free Tuesdays
content: Every Tuesday, kids under 10 eat free with a paying adult.

title: Online Ordering Now Available
content: Order your favourites online for pickup or delivery!
